title: Scott Cooper Sets A Roswell UFO Film
description: Following their work together on “Springsteen: Deliver Me from Nowhere,” filmmaker Scott Cooper is re-teaming with 20th Century Studios on a new untitled UFO film. Cooper writes & directs while Eric Robinson and Ellen Goldsmith-Vein produce the thriller film, which will reportedly deal with the events in Roswell, New Mexico in 1947 when a rancher [...]The post Scott Cooper Sets A Roswell UFO Film appeared first on Dark Horizons.

title: 7 Truly Bizarre UFO Sightings the Government Can’t (or Won’t) Explain
description: The problem with UFO sightings isn’t a lack of explanations. It’s that some explanations feel designed to end the conversation rather than answer it. A small number of cases stick around because they were witnessed by people who know what they’re looking at, supported by data that exists on paper, and followed by official responses [...]The post 7 Truly Bizarre UFO Sightings the Government Can’t (or Won’t) Explain appeared first on VICE.

title: Miners left totally floored after spotting 'genuine UFO' racing across the morning sky
description: Workers at a mine in Australia were baffled when they saw the mysterious flying object racing through the sky — but some are not convinced on what they really saw
